events.name: onSelectionChange
events.description: Handler that is called when the selection changes.

fullWidth.description: Whether the tabs should take the full width of its parent.

disabledKeys.description: The item keys that are disabled. These items cannot be selected, focused, or otherwise interacted with.

selectedKey.description: The key for the currently selected item.

defaultSelectedKey.description: The key for the initially selected item.

disallowEmptySelection.description: Whether the tabs should allow empty selection.

keyboardActivation.description: Whether tabs are activated automatically on focus or manually.

motionProps.description: The props to modify the cursor framer motion animation. Use the `variants` API to create your own animation.

disableCursorAnimation.description: Whether the cursor should be hidden.

isDisabled.description: Whether the tab list should be disabled.

disableAnimation.description: Whether the tab list should be animated.

classNames.description: Allows to set custom class names for the card slots.
